name: steam-eruption
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to burn the target.
short_effect: Has a 30% chance to burn the target.

flavor_text.sword_shield: The user immerses the target in superheated steam. This may also leave the target with a burn.
flavor_text.legends_arceus: The user immerses the target in superheated steam. This may also leave the target with a burn.
